function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased physical activity energy expenditure during quarantine","Impact":"Potential increase in contagious diseases transmission due to more movement and interaction in the built environment","Mitigation":"Promote adherence to safety protocols, encourage outdoor exercise in uncrowded areas, and implement thorough cleaning and sanitation practices","Technologies":"Contactless entry systems, air purifiers, and UV disinfection systems for indoor spaces","People":"Individuals at home, specifically those engaging in increased physical activity","Owner":"Health organizations, local authorities, and individuals"},{"Description":"Decreased physical activity levels during the pandemic","Impact":"Potential decline in overall health and immune system function, increasing susceptibility to contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Promote remote fitness programs, encourage outdoor physical activity while adhering to safety guidelines, and provide mental health support","Technologies":"Virtual fitness platforms, wearable health technology, and remote monitoring systems","People":"All age groups, particularly the elderly and at-risk individuals","Owner":"Health and fitness organizations, local authorities, and individuals"},{"Description":"Gender differences in exercise habits","Impact":"Varied risk of exposure to contagious diseases based on exercise preferences and locations","Mitigation":"Education on safe exercise practices, development of inclusive fitness options, and promotion of diverse workout environments","Technologies":"Online fitness education platforms, community fitness apps, and location-based fitness resources","People":"Men and women with different exercise preferences","Owner":"Health and fitness organizations, community leaders, and individuals"}]}
